title: (x) Shakira website font - Endor {Mike F}
content:
I was wondering if by any chance this is an actual existing font or just special made for her website? it is different from the one on her album cover so I thought there might be a slight chance :) ty in advance for any help.

I've already tried : [http://www.identifont.com/identify.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20130621102946/http:/www.identifont.com/identify.html "http://www.identifont.com/identify.html") and [http://www.myfonts.com/WhatTheFont/](http://web.archive.org/web/20130621102946/http:/www.myfonts.com/WhatTheFont/ "http://www.myfonts.com/WhatTheFont/") with no real luck.

Font here : [http://www.shakira.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20130621102946/http:/www.shakira.com/ "http://www.shakira.com")

also attached it just in case it doesn't work :)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [whatthefont.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20130621102946/http:/typophile.com/files/whatthefont.gif) | 30.78 KB |
author: angellika

comments.content: Well, since the "a" characters are different, I would suspect that this is custom work.

that's true.. I didn't really noticed

but the way they colored it and stuff I figured they could switch it up a bit to make it look more hand written but it might be a font \*shrug\*

thanks for pointing that out :) know of anything similar? more so of the S.. I love the S...

_If you like that 'spiky' 'S', maybe youll love_ ' [Brutaal](http://web.archive.org/web/20130621102946/http:/www.themicrofoundry.com/f_brutaal.html)' _( Daam ), by fellow Typophile Hrant H Papazian / The MicroFoundry,_ ' [Kruella](http://web.archive.org/web/20130621102946/http:/www.t26.com/fonts/display.php?f_id=446)' + ' [Shiraz](http://web.archive.org/web/20130621102946/http:/www.t26.com/fonts/display.php?f_id=449&dw=1943)'_, by [Margo Chase](http://web.archive.org/web/20130621102946/http:/www.margochase.com/) / T.26, or even_ ' [Priori](http://web.archive.org/web/20130621102946/http:/www.emigre.com/dp/getfontpage.php?SFEMPRREGMC.html)' _( Serif, Alternate ), by [Jonathan Barnbrook](http://web.archive.org/web/20130621102946/http:/www.barnbrook.net/) / Emigre_..

There were modifications, especially to that S, but I think that [Endor](http://web.archive.org/web/20130621102946/http:/www.dafont.com/en/search.php?q=endor++c&nb_ppp_old=10&page=1&text=Shakira&nb_ppp=10&classt=alpha) was definitely the base font. I like Dav's suggested fonts a lot better, though. Endor is just trying to mimic the lettering off of the Charmed TV series.

[that](http://web.archive.org/web/20130621102946/http:/www.dafont.com/en/font.php?file=a_charming_font&text=Shakira) one show, eh?

I really can't believe it's a real font I gave up after the first reply really..

Thank you so much, Mike!

Dav{formlos}, those are beautiful fonts also :) but I'm glad Mike found something so perfect because I am pretty broke hehe.

Nice find, Mike.. _The interesting thing is, the original 'Charmed' logotype has even been designed by Margo Chase ( [www.margochase.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20130621102946/http:/www.margochase.com/) \> portfolio \> entertainment \> the wb network \> charmed ).._ :)

Hah! And from that a font is extrapolated, eh?

Thanks for the interesting pointer, Dav.

is the font underneath the Buffy logo {Kruella} ?

[this](http://web.archive.org/web/20130621102946/http:/images.amazon.com/images/P/B0006IUE16.01.LZZZZZZZ.jpg) is how I remembered the charming logo hehe..I didn't see it was remade.
Er, that certainly appears to be Kruella, doesn't it? I see that Endor is listed as a Buffy font on several fan sites, but, not being a fan myself, I have no idea what the inspiration for it was.
